* no, I am not really good at looking at <code>objdump</code> output
* tools scan binaries for <i>gadgets</i>
* one you'll use in upcoming homework


### gadgets generally 


* bits of machine code that do work, then return or jump
* ‘‘chain’’ together, by having them jump to each other
* most common: find gadget ending with <code>ret</code>  

   * pops address of next gadget offs tack
